agency: Department of Game and Inland Fisheries

species.name: Hybrid Striped Bass

images.name: Hybrid Striped Bass
images.credit: Duane Raver, U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service

species.identification: Striped Bass family. This is a striped bass Ã— white bass cross, with a body shape between that of striper and white bass. Silvery-white with up to 8 dark broken stripes; first stripe below lateral line complete to tail. Tongue tooth patches are intermediate between white and striped bass. Typically less than 10 lbs.

fishing_techniques: Tackle and techniques very similar to striped bass, but often with a little lighter tackle. Shiners and a variety of spoons, crankbaits, and jigs are favorite baits.
